name: 蓝宝石般的被害妄想少女
name_original: 蓝宝石般的被害妄想少女
description:
《The blue-diamond Damsel in distress》l is a new style of very brainstorming adventure game, you need to complete all the content of the previous chapter to unlock the new plot. The process of finding the truth of a case is full of confusion and various difficult reasoning challenges. You need to have certain clues to get the truth accurately. You need to go into various scenes of time to show your reasoning ability. Combining with the information described in various figures, you can find the correct answer. Each chapter has a wonderful inside. Allow you to challenge, constantly explore all kinds of strange cases around Li Meiyuan, incarnate detective step by step reasoning to get the right clues to guide the plot forward.



features:

To get caught up in the delusion of victimization, you need to face up to all kinds of difficult plot chapters, and use wisdom to solve a paragraph of puzzles;

Find the right clues to lead the story to different endings and you will have a fantastic adventure.

Various characters appear in your world and intersect with you. They are analyzed and interpreted according to the text information they bring.
